meta.description: Monitor plain text log file(s) for new entries and send to remote syslog collector
meta.long_description: Lightweight daemon to tail one or more log files and transmit UDP syslog messages to a remote syslog host (centralized log aggregation). Generates UDP packets itself instead of depending on a system syslog daemon, so it doesn't affect system-wide logging configuration.
meta.name: ruby-remote_syslog
